channel.title: Teachings on Cynthia Siew
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on Cynthia Siew

item.title: Teaching Experience
item.description: University of Warwick (2017-) Personal tutor for first years University of Kansas (2012-2017) Summer 2016 PSYC 318 Cognitive Psychology (Assistant Instructor) 8-week “pure” online class of 59 students Fall 2015, Spring 2016, Fall 2016, Spring 2017 PSYC 104 General Psychology (Assistant Instructor) Team-taught by a team of Faculty Coordinators, Graduate Assistant Instructors, and Graduate Teaching Assistants Served as an instructor of record for ~500 students Hybrid, “flipped” classroom format: a significant online learning component + weekly in-class meetings Developed and facilitated in-class discussions and group activities designed to maximize active learning and collaboration among student learning teams Spring 2015

item.title: Teaching Portfolio
item.description: University of Kansas (2012-2017) PSYC 104 General Psychology PSYC 318 Cognitive Psychology (online) PSYC 104 General Psychology Student Evaluations: Summary of Student Evaluations (Fall 2015/Spring 2016/Fall 2016) Fall 2015 (KU Student Survey of Teaching) Spring 2016 (KU Student Survey of Teaching) Fall 2016 (KU Student Survey of Teaching) Spring 2017 (KU Student Survey of Teaching) - forthcoming Sample Lesson Plans: Zombie Neuroscience “Speed Dating” - Learning Psychological Disorders and Social Media Pinwheel Discussions - Language, Thought, and Intelligence Design a toy!
